DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate investigational refrigerate vaccine measles , mumps , rubella , varicella well tolerate similar immune response compare frozen vaccine measles , mumps , rubella , varicella .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Frozen Versus Refrigerated MMRV ( Combined Measles , Mumps , Rubella , Varicella ) Investigational Vaccine ( V221-016 )
DOC.criteria: Healthy child 1223 month age Previously measles , mumps , rubella , varicella Compromised immune system
